result.execSummary:
The defendant Montreal D Foster was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Felon Possess Firearm, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 941.29(2)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

parties.name: Milwaukee County Clerk of Circuit Court

supervisions.notes:
Defendant shall provide a DNA sample for the Data Bank and pay all appropriate costs by 8.31.15.
Court ordered defendant to pay all applicable court costs and surcharges by 8.31.15 or, if not paid, a civil judgment is ordered.

Court advised defendant that as a convicted felon he may never possess a firearm or body armor. Court advised defendant that his voting rights are suspended and he may not vote in any election until his civil rights are restored.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Montreal D Foster

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Original Transcript PLEA & SENTENCING HEARING (29 pages) commencing JUNE 30, 2015 received and filed.
ORDER TO PRODUCE, TUESDAY, JUNE 30, 2015 AT 8:30 A.M. IN BR 7, CH RM 629. kl

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Montreal D Foster not in court, in custody.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 7.  Status conference scheduled for 06-30-2015 at 08:30 am.

Certification of transcript of proceedings of PRELIMINARY HEARING commencing 05/01/2015 received and filed. (8 Pages.)
Copy of transcript forwarded to Stephen Sargent, Milwaukee Office of the State Public Defender, 819 North 6th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53233.

Attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent in court, defendant Montreal D Foster not in court, in custody.  Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
NO COURT FILE.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference in Branch 7.  Status conference scheduled for 06-02-2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Montreal D Foster in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Montreal D Foster in custody.  Ronald Dague for Randy P. Sitzberger appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Preliminary hearing proceeded.  Court took judicial notice of certified documents regarding case #11CF1828 that are attached to the complaint.  Sworn for the state:Anthony Randazzo-MPD Officer.    State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and pleads not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 07.  Scheduling conference scheduled for May 6, 2015 at 08:30 am.

No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.  Defendant advised it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Montreal D Foster in court with attorney Stephen Andrew Sargent.  Defendant Montreal D Foster in custody.  Carole Manchester appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk:  bm
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge McAdams, Branch 7.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for May 1, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
April 23, 2015 @ 8:30A in In Custody Intake, CJF Rm 137A of the Circuit Court of Milwaukee County.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
